message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth and provides you with an exceptional return on investment given its value to you at $800,000. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially making this transaction a reality.
